text: Joseph Michael Scanlan (19 March 1900 – 23 April 1969) was an Australian rules footballer who played with South Melbourne in the VFL during the 1920s. Scanlan was a defender and captained South Melbourne in 1928, 1930 and 1931. He represented Victoria 6 times in interstate football. == References == ==External links== * * Category:1900 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Sydney Swans players Category:Leopold Football Club (MJFA) players Category:1969 deaths
title: Joe Scanlan
